workshoptitle: Accelerate your Applications: Achieve Blazing Fast SQL With an Oracle TimesTen Cache

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction to the TimesTen Cache Introduction Workshop.

tutorials.title: Get started - Cloud Login
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare setup
tutorials.description: How to download the ORM stack and, optionally, update security rules for an existing VCN

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Environment setup
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Connect to the workshop compute instance using NoVNC Remote Desktop
Lab 4: Connect to the workshop compute instance using SSH (optional)
Lab 6: Create a TimesTen instance
tutorials.description: Create and start a TimesTen instance and execute some basic commands

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Prepare the Oracle database for caching
tutorials.description: Prepare the Oracle database to support TimesTen caching

tutorials.title: Lab 8: Prepare the TimesTen cache
tutorials.description: Create a TimesTen database and set it up as a cache

tutorials.title: Lab 9: Load Oracle data into the cache
tutorials.description: Perform the initial data load from Oracle to establish the cache

tutorials.title: Lab 11: Measure OLTP performance improvement
tutorials.description: Run a simple OLTP benchmark to compare the performance with and without the cache

tutorials.title: Lab 12: Measure query performance improvement
tutorials.description: Use a query timing program to compare query performance with and without the cache

tutorials.title: Lab 14: Shut down the TimesTen cache and instance
tutorials.description: Perform an orderly shut down of TimesTen

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
